response.overview: Blanca is a young illustrator who has just become independent and her life is a mess. But when her mother bombards her with questions, Blanca prefers to disguise reality to avoid worrying her. On the walls of her house, she invents an illusory life, drawn to life size. The story is narrated through phone messages and shared photos between mother and daughter. But on the other side of the mobile camera, Áurea, her partner, observes the lies weaving around their relationship.
response.title: Estoy Bien, Mamá
